page.title: 19Customs in Mayfield (cont.)
page.content: September brings the Mayfield Carnival & Fair with a Street Market in the afternoon.In the evening Bonfire Societies travel from miles around to take part in the torchlight fancy dress procession.The societies, including the Mayfield 'Bonfire Boys & Belles'travel to all Carnivals in the area,right through to November,to raise money for Charity.Harvest Supper & Thanksgiving also take place in the Autumn.In November the men & women of the British Legion join the Scouts, Guides,Brownies,Cubs &the Band for the Rememberance Day Procession & Service. December brings Christmas parties for the Senior Citizens,schools & clubs. The village also turns out to see the Convent Girls act out the Nativity in the High Street followed by a live crib in the Convent Chapel.
